column6: ACT III: NEW WORLD DISORDER - Who will live? Who will die? Who will remain inverted? A shocking climax that promises to crack the Marvel Universe to its very core! - An old foe must claim the mantle of his greatest enemy to save the lives of all he cares for! - An X-Man's horrifying fate! An Avenger's appalling choice! If you read only one comic this century â€" This is it!
